meanings.definition: A type of percussion instrument consisting of a pair of small metal plates.
meanings.sent1: During the concert, the musician played the timbals with great skill.
meanings.sent2: The timbals added a lively rhythm to the music performance.
meanings.sent3: The timbals seemed to dance on their own, creating a magical sound.
meanings.sent4: The timbals sang like tiny metallic birds in the orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the timbals echoed through the hall, captivating the audience.
